author: stevel
msg: Text + example of how to use a task in the file it is compiled. Keeping silent on taskdef's property file loading functionality so that people dont start using it just before it gets taken away.

author: stevel
msg: IE6 on winXP doesn't like the ' entity, rather than replace it with a single quote and break some other browser  the sentence was reworked to indicate possesion differently.
